urls.description: Positives: Q3 comparable operating result in the black for the first time in almost three years and the strategy work proceeds; negatives: net result still in the red, long journey ahead. Erkka Salonen, Director, Investor Relations We published our interim report on Friday. The positive operating result after a long break was pleasant news, and it was great to see that there was so much interest in our results, as our events on Friday had good attendances. Thanks to everyone who was present at our

data.text: Our Q3 was a mixture of positives and negatives. The comparable operating result was in the black for the first time in almost 3 years and our strategy work proceeded. However, the net result remains in the red, and we have a long journey ahead of us. https://t.co/50cBuCNxKc

urls.title: What is a multi-city booking?
urls.description: By selecting “Multi-city” as the trip type, you can book a round trip for different routes in each direction. For example, you can fly from Helsinki to Rome and return from Paris to Helsinki, the travel between Rome and Paris being arranged on your own by other means. You must return from the same continent you flew to and to the same continent you left from. For example, you can fly from E urope to Asia and back from Asia to Europe but not from Europe to Asia and then from Asia to North America. When

data.text: If you want to make more complex bookings, choose “Multi-city” as your trip type in our booking engine.
